chunk:
Authentic Skin Remedies Cleanse

Brand: Authentic Skin Remedies

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aloe barbadensis (Organic Aloe) Leaf Juice, Lavandula angustifolia (Organic Lavender) Flower Water, Anthemis nobilis (Organic Roman Chamomile) Flower Water, Helianthus annuus (Organic Sunflower) Seed Oil, Organic Vanilla Flavor, Cocamidopropyl B

or, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Laureth Sulfoacetate, Vegetable Glycerin, Pro-Vitamin B5, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Simmondsia chinensis (Organic Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa mosqueta (Organic Rosehip) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; L
& Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
